title_sort: richard maurice bucke to walt whitman, 16 november 1888
title: Richard Maurice Bucke to Walt Whitman, 16 November 1888
text: Superintendent's Office.ASYLUM FOR THE INSANELONDON.ONTARIOLondon, Ont.,16 Nov 1888Your card of 13th also newspaper and "Galaxy" article came to hand yesterday they were all most welcome. Of course I had the "Galaxy" article (have had it for years) but was glad to have another copy. All quiet here, no word from Wm Gurd, it begins to smell wintry, ground is white with snow this morning but not very cold yet. I see they have had it 12 below zero at Calgaryâ€”nice cool country that.Shall write soon again, shall surely here from Gurd before long nowR M BuckeLetter written by Dr. Bucke to Walt Whitman You might put this in Vol 3 With WW in Camden Richard Maurice Bucke to Walt Whitman, 16 November 1888
